title: Dice for random study breaks!
content: This was inspired by the pomodoro method and my inability to make decisions. When you are taking a quick 5 minute study break, use this digital die to decide what to do!

title: Hello!
content:
why hellooo! this is my blog where I am practicing writing and coding! I'm still learning so it's not perfect but I hope I get better at expressing myself, writing, and programming. Wish me luck.

✸ Mary ✸
